info.name: Hustler eCommerce Backend APIs
info.description:
**A brief note:**

This app is to demonstrate the working APIs (GET) using the Fake

**Tech stack:**

Node + Express

**How to setup project:**  
`git clone https://github.com/shikharbhatnagar/hustler-tests`  
`cd ecommerce_app`  
`npm install`

**How to run the project:**

`npm run dev`

**Sample Postman requests:**

a) Get All Products : GET [http://localhost:4000/api/v1/products](http://localhost:3000/products)

b) Filter by catgory : GET [http://localhost:4000/api/v1/products?category=men's](http://localhost:4000/products?category=men's) collection

c) Filter by product id : GET [http://localhost:4000/api/v1/products/1](http://localhost:3000/products/1)0

d) New Product : Can be implemented but need the DB setup or Fake API permissions
